programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: The Extreme Series continues with the Annihilator; a knockout competition between six competitors, over the course of four rounds and a final, six will be reduced to one, the annihilator champion.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Learn more about this infamous Robot and the family that built it. With an unforgettable design and devastating weapon, this competitor became an instant icon.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Debuting in the Second Wars, to becoming the most successful Robot ever to take part in Robot Wars. This Robot put the squeeze on all the competition, including the House Robots.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Six robots will be reduced down to one in this annihilator episode. Qualifiers from the Mayhem battles previously in the series. Which competitor will battle through the four rounds and defeat the opposition in the final.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: The Extreme series returns to its normal format after the first Annihilator. Four mixed battles, followed by a Main Event, which in this episode is an All-Stars battle between Pussycat and Stinger.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Shunt and Dead Metal prepare to be let loose from the sidelines in this episodes Main Event, House Robot Rebellion. Three unfortunate competitors will be put into the arena as the House Robots have free reign in this destructive episode.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: We have reached the Quarter Finals for the All-Stars battles in this episodeâ€™s Main Event and another Mayhem battle puts another three robots up against each other.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Four of the best robots armed with rear-hinged flippers go against each other to prove whose best in Flipper Frenzy. Other battles on the card are the Challenge Belt, Tag Team Terror, Wild Card Warriors and Mayhem battle.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Current World Champions Razer are matched against fierce competitor Firestorm in this All-stars match. Four robots make their way to the arena to take part in the German Melee, with the winner securing a place in the Second World Championship.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: The Featherweight Championship takes place in this episode, along with the Challenge Belt, Mayhem battle and more Wildcard Warriors. All these build-up to the Main event, the Tag Team Terror finals.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: The second annihilator was supposed to be between the six winners of the mayhem qualifiers, but due to the severity of damage from the battle, two of the robots had to be replaced. Will the two replacements seize this opportunity?

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: The UK are up against renowned German Engineering in a UK vs Germany battle. Two more rivals have a chance to settle the score in another vengeance battle and other unmissable battles take place before the long awaited All-Stars Grand Final.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Robots from around the globe ready themselves for the ultimate contest, The Second World Championship. Will lightning strike twice for defending champions Razer, or will they reign be snuffed out by one of the many fierce competitors?

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Six teams comprised of armed and emergency services enter their robots for battle, will their unpredictable and dangerous occupations prepare them for the carnage of the arena or will the house robots make them quake in their boots?

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: The first heat of the All-Stars Championship, this heat determines which two robots go through to All-stars grand-final. Veteran robots all enter the arena once again as they put their experience to the test against each other.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Six more renowned robots fight their way through the heats to fight for a chance to be the All-Star champion. One competitor in particular strikes fear into the roster. The two winners of each heat face off for the title in the Grand Final.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: The Extreme Series continues with the Annihilator; a knockout competition between six competitors, over the course of four rounds and a final, six will be reduced to one, the annihilator champion.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: A knockout tournament with children at the helm. Will the house robots go easy on the kids, or will they just be easy targets?

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Sixteen robots make eight teams in this Tag Team Terror. With only one robot permitted to battle at a time, will the teams share responsibility or will one bite off more than they can chew?

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: The New Blood Heats consisted of two three-way melees and then head-to-head battles, the two winners of the latter would fight, and the remaining robot would be sent to the Grand Finals. The champions would gain automatic entry to The Seventh Wars.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: The New Blood heats continue as six more robots come to test their metal. One of the competitors takes a beating from the house robots, will it spell the end of their time in the competition?

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Four UK robots versus four R.O.W robots, the World Series victor will be decided by points, over a two episode tournament. Fighting for glory and country, the pressure is on. Will the competitors do their compatriots proud?

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: The wars wage on, with Team UK dominating this stage of the competition, will the home-ground advantage keep them on form, or will Team R.O.W cause a spectacular upset?

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: The arena welcomes six new combatants during the third round of the heats. One competitor that seemingly lacks a weapon, surprises the judges. The two new house robots both get a chance to attack.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: The Fourth and last heat to decide which robots will make it to the final. Refbot loses his patience and starts inflicting harm on the competitors.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: The Four winners of the heats face each other in two eliminators, a play-off and a final battle between the two remaining robots. Only the most ferocious robot will be able to call themselves, the New Blood Champions.
